metadata.title: CVE-2017-15369 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The build_filter_chain function in pdf/pdf-stream.c in Artifex MuPDF before 2017-09-25 mishandles a certain case where a variable may reside in a register, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Fitz fz_drop_imp use-after-free and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted PDF document.

notes.note: ratliff> reproducer segfaults on xenial without the breaking commit

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.0+ds1-1').
